name: Earth Child Binder
prerequisiteFormula: @wis_score >= 13 AND (@race:dwarf OR @race:gnome) AND @ability:defensive_training AND @feat:earth_child_style AND @feat:earth_child_topple AND @feat:greater_trip AND @feat:improved_trip AND @feat:improved_unarmed_strike AND @ability:stunning_fist#unchained_monk AND @skill:acrobatics >= 9
descriptionText: Even the greatest giants fear your technique.
